long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Powerful note gives you simple way to secret your notes. It is ideal for storing information like list open tab, current tab url, selection text, etc...

Privacy and permissions:
- Access opening tab's url. It's use to save all opening tab's url.
- This extension can't make any remote requests or submit any data!
- This extension is NOT using own cloud servers, data are synchronized by "Chrome Sync" engine.
- Everything are never stored - they are only kept in the system memory.
